title: Loot problem
body: yesterday i rerolled 3 skins :SSW Singed, foxfire Ahri and blood moon kennen and suddenly the game crashed and when i got back in the launcher i saw there is nothing except for a skin i got in hextech (dark star tresh) and  1 lvl 6 yasuo

replies.body: Are you using any third party programs that interacts with League?  This can cause hextech crafting to crash out or other issues.   I looked into this for you to see what happened, and it looks like your reroll resulted in Bittersweet Lulu.  Congrats!

i dont use third party programs and i dont have any lulu skin...
like i said i have only 1 skin in the loot that i got from hextech 
https://gyazo.com/f0efd7a02068433370df655bad5bcc4d

When you reroll shards into something that you don't already have, it will automatically unlock on the account.  You will find the Lulu skin in your **collections **and available for use, not hextech crafting.  Let me know if that clears things up!
